Locations.Name: Entrance
Locations.Description: This is the entrance room. Passages lead north, east, and west.

Locations.Name: Storage
Locations.Description: You are in a small storage room. There is an exit to the west.

Locations.Name: Throne Room
Locations.Description: There is a big ass throne here. An opening lies to the south.

Locations.Name: Pool
Locations.Description: It's very very wet here.  The entrance room is to the east.

Locations.Name: Cave
Locations.Description: There is a big ass dripstone on the roof that could drop at any moment. You can go east, south, or west.

Locations.Name: East Cave
Locations.Description: There is a very high wall with rock holds that could be climbed.

Locations.Name: South Cave
Locations.Description: You see a tiny opening with glistening gold on the other side. You can go south.

Locations.Name: Lake Cave
Locations.Description: There is a large body of water that some people call a Lake. You see a perfectly maintained beach house in the middle of the lake. You can try swimming to the house that is south, go west, or go north.

Locations.Name: Lake
Locations.Description: There is water surrounding you as you enter the lake.

Locations.Name: Lake House
Locations.Description: There is a two story house with a wooden lock.

Locations.Name: Living Room
Locations.Description: There is furniture that has been collecting dust inside and rotting food on the kitchen counter.

Locations.Name: Laboratory
Locations.Description: You enter a pristine white room full of research equipment. There is a stand at the back of the room that holds two vials: one green and one red.

Locations.Name: Bedroom
Locations.Description: There is a closet overflowing with dirty clothes, a messy desk with blueprints on top, and a unmade bed.

Locations.Name: Amazon Rainforest Cave
Locations.Description: You pass through a humid tunnel with vines hanging from the walls. There are endless Brazil Nut trees surrounding you.

Locations.Name: West Cave
Locations.Description: There is a massive wooden door with a diamond lock.
